en_US.name: Apple AirPods Pro 2nd Gen
en_US.description: Advanced wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and spatial audio. Premium sound quality in a compact, comfortable design.

de_DE.name: AirPods Pro 2. Generation
de_DE.description: Fortschrittliche kabellose Kopfhörer mit aktiver Geräuschunterdrückung und 3D-Audio. Premium Sound in kompaktem Design.
